Scripts.OnClick: if ( IsShiftKeyDown() ) then if ( ChatFrameEditBox:IsVisible() ) then ChatFrameEditBox:Insert(GetAuctionItemLink("list", this:GetParent():GetID() + FauxScrollFrame_GetOffset(BrowseScrollFrame))); end else BrowseButton_OnClick(this:GetParent()); end

if ( IsShiftKeyDown() ) then if ( ChatFrameEditBox:IsVisible() ) then ChatFrameEditBox:Insert(GetAuctionItemLink("bidder", this:GetParent():GetID() + FauxScrollFrame_GetOffset(BidScrollFrame))); end else BidButton_OnClick(this:GetParent()); end

if ( IsShiftKeyDown() ) then if ( ChatFrameEditBox:IsVisible() ) then ChatFrameEditBox:Insert(GetAuctionItemLink("owner", this:GetParent():GetID() + FauxScrollFrame_GetOffset(AuctionsScrollFrame))); end else AuctionsButton_OnClick(this:GetParent()); end
